title: The ZDoom Community Map Project "Take 2"
description: The ZDoom Community Map Project "Take 2" - Cacoward winner 2013

screenshots.caption: The lagoon. The rapid fire trooper on the left shows the location of secret #14.
The simulation room, showing its surreal aesthetic.
The central junction, where you encounter the cyberdemon. The red key is seen on the marble block.
Caverns area near the engineering bay. The spider mastermind is found around the corner to the right.
The perimeter of the dig site. As you can see, there is plenty of cover to hide from the angels.
The first major fight in hell takes place here. The towers are occupied by the first vores of the level.
Overlooking the final area, showing the generator towering over the arena. We also see the bridge leading to the arena, and in the bottom left, Dr. Acheron's body next to a megasphere.
